metadata.inclusion:
Please proceed with the door lock open.
1. Set the controller in inclusion mode.
2. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 7 seconds.
3. Press the [1][4][7] button after pressing the [R] button
metadata.exclusion:
Please proceed with the door lock open.
1. Set the controller in exclusion mode.
2. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 7 seconds.
3. Press the [3][6][7] button after pressing the [R] button
metadata.reset:
Please proceed with the door lock open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 9 seconds.
2. Press the [1][2][3][6][5][4][7] button after pressing the [R] button.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
